p.k: Short, Drama Switzerland (2011). Hrají: Geraldine Bagnoud, Prune Beuchat, Zuriel De Peslouan. Režie: Adrienne Bovet.
p.d: On a carnival evening, in a small town, Margaux, Louisa and Théo are about to go dancing. They dress up and drink a little too much. Margaux is hoping to meet the boy who will give her her first real kiss. Louisa is not expecting anything, except maybe the final straw in her bored existence. Théo, their little brother and friend, wants to get drunk, waltz and forget himself.
